    		University Public Engagement
    	University Public Engagement (UPE) is a broad spectrum campus unit within the division of University Advancement. With special responsibility for public event oversight.UPE manages:Chico Performances: Performing arts and lecture seriesUniversity Box Office: Ticketing and patron service for Athletics, School of the Arts, Chico Performances, North State Symphony, and CommencementCommencement and Special EventsUniversity alcohol policy and concessions service Laxson Auditorium: Historic 1930’s campus performance venueUPE provides oversight of North State Public Radio (NSPR) and the University’s agreement with CapRadio, Sacramento to manage NSPR.University AdvancementVice President Ahmad BouraKendall Hall, Room 114530-898-3590www.csuchico.edu/advancementSupport Chico StateDepartmentsAdvancement ServicesAlumni & Parent EngagementUniversity CommunicationsUniversity DevelopmentUniversity Public EngagementChico Performances(opens in new window)
We acknowledge and are mindful that Chico State stands on lands that were originally occupied by the first people of this area, Mechoopda, and we recognize their distinctive spiritual relationship with this land, the flora, the fauna, and the waters that run through campus. We are humbled that our campus resides upon sacred lands that since time immemorial have sustained the Mechoopda people and continue to do so today.Contact UsNeed Help?FacebookFacebookTwitterTwitterInstagramInstagramReport an accessibility issueReport a broken link on this pageTitle IXPrivacy PolicyCalifornia State University, Chico400 West First StreetChico, CA 95929Copyright © 2023 All Rights Reserved
